title: Modern elegant apartment for sale
details:
Softlogic Properties (Pvt) Ltd, a fully owned subsidiary of Softlogic Holdings PLC, brings city dwellers its latest affordable luxury apartment to Colombo’s most prestigious residential area- De Fonseka Road, Colombo 5, featuring 6-floors with 25 state-of-the-art, eco-friendly units ranging from two to five bedroom spaces.

The apartment provides residents with the highest convenience as it offers easy access to many of the city’s reputed banks, supermarkets, hospitals, restaurants, recreational services, and especially leading schools within a 2 km radius such as Visaka, Holy Family Convent, Isipathana, St Paul’s, Srimavo, St Peter’s, Royal, Thurstan.

Everest Apartments truly offer a first-class living experience for city dwellers. Its strategic location, luxury amenities, elegant building design and landscaped garden roof terrace among so many others makes it an irresistible investment which will only appreciate significantly over time. With a CMC/RDA planned 30ft roadway linking the apartment complex with R A De Mel Mawatha it will only provide more convenience and a greater access in the future.
